name: Aishwary Sinha
position: Product Designer at Manipal Fintech | Product Thinker | ex-BuyUcoin
about: As a Senior Product Designer at SahiBandhu, I create innovative and user-friendly web and mobile applications that address the needs and challenges of rural communities in India. I work with a cross-functional team of developers, researchers, and marketers to deliver solutions that are impactful, scalable, and sustainable. I have a Master of Computer Applications degree from JSS Academy of Technical Education, Noida, and a Bachelor of Computer Application degree from Avviare Education Hub. I also have a bit of knowledge of coding concepts in Java and PHP, which helps me to communicate effectively with the technical team and understand the feasibility and limitations of the design. I am passionate about product design and UI/UX, and I am always curious and eager to explore new things and learn new skills. I have multiple certifications and honors in design and entrepreneurship, and I have contributed to several successful projects at BuyUcoin and The DigiBee Network as a Lead Designer and an Assistant Manager Product Design and UI/UX Designer.

name: Badal Sona
position: Quality Analyst Engineer Software Automation Test Engineer | Automation - Selenium | Manual Test Engineer | API Testing | QA Engineer
about: Proficient Test Automation Engineer with 3.5 years of IT experience in Manual and Automation Testing across web and mobile applications. Strong background in all stages of the Software Testing Life Cycle (STLC), including functional, integration, and end-to-end testing. Core Competencies: • Test Automation: Skilled in automating web applications using Selenium WebDriver with Java, developing robust scripts for consistent test execution and increased testing efficiency. • Frameworks: Experienced in Hybrid and Data-Driven frameworks, utilizing TestNG, the Page Object Model (POM), and industry-standard design patterns to ensure modular, reusable, and maintainable test structures. • Tools & Technologies: Proficient with essential tools such as Jenkins for CI/CD, Maven for build management, and GitHub for version control. Well-versed in API testing with Postman and RESTful services for end-to-end testing. Familiar with SQL for database validation and ensuring data integrity. • Domains: Hands-on experience in the Banking and E-commerce sectors, demonstrating a strong understanding of domain-specific testing needs and regulatory requirements. • Additional Skills: Extensive knowledge of XPath, DOM manipulation, and Agile methodologies. Comfortable working in collaborative, fast-paced environments, ensuring high-quality deliverables aligned with Agile practices.

name: Saurabh Jha
position: Human Resources Professional | Driving People & Process Excellence | Passionate About Building Engaged, Productive Workforces
about: As a seasoned Human Resources Professional with over a decade of experience, I have dedicated my career to fostering inclusive, dynamic, and productive work environments. My expertise spans across HR Business Partner (HRBP) operations, Diversity, Equity, and Inclusion (DEI) initiatives, recruitment, policy development, team leadership, change management, performance management systems (PMS), and compliance. Throughout my career, I have consistently demonstrated a passion for people and a commitment to driving organizational success through strategic HR practices. I excel in building strong, engaged teams and implementing innovative HR solutions that align with business objectives. Key Highlights: HRBP Operations: Proven track record in aligning HR strategies with business goals to enhance organizational performance. DEI Initiatives: Deeply committed to promoting diversity, equity, and inclusion to create a more equitable workplace. Recruitment: Skilled in attracting, hiring, and retaining top talent across various industries. Policy Development: Expertise in crafting and implementing HR policies that support company culture and compliance. Team Handling: Strong leadership abilities with experience in managing and developing high-performing teams. Change Management: Adept at guiding organizations through change, ensuring smooth transitions and minimal disruption. Performance Management: Proficient in designing and executing effective performance management systems. Compliance: Thorough understanding of HR compliance and regulatory requirements to mitigate risks. My approach is centered on the belief that a happy and engaged workforce is the cornerstone of any successful organization. I am passionate about creating workplaces where employees feel valued, supported, and motivated to contribute their best. Let's connect and explore how I can help your organization achieve its HR goals and drive continuous improvement.

name: Sylvester Domingo
position: Digital Transformation , CX, Process Excellence, Audit & Compliance
about: As Head Center of Excellence at Manipal Fintech, I leverage my years of experience in Digital strategy & transformation, operations and business management to drive growth and innovation in the fintech industry. I hold a Bachelor of Commerce degree from Calcutta University and a Certified ScrumMaster® certification from Scrum Alliance, ISO 9001 certified Internal Auditor & 6 Sigma Green Belt certifications, demonstrating my commitment to continuous learning and improvement. I have a proven track record of leading cross-functional teams, implementing agile methodologies, and delivering high-quality results. My skills in digital strategy, scrum, and agile methodologies enable me to navigate complex challenges and opportunities in the dynamic fintech landscape. I am passionate about creating value for customers, stakeholders, and the organization as a whole.

posts.title: The Digital Space! Are we doing enough?

experience.title: AVP - Telesales Digital Strategy
experience.description: Currently heading the Digital Sales portfolio and Leading the initiative to set up a telecalling unit for the Organically routed Customers.  Introduced WFH Tele for SBI Card. With complete digital solutioning Plan and Execute GTM strategy for effective increase in sales penetration using digital technology Responsible for technology transition across locations, spanning over 4000 users.  Introduced fool proof security systems to make processes compliant across locations.  Created and deployed a rigorous Reporting and MIS process across these locations. Introducing & Developing digital one view dashboards for all locations.  Responsible for system integration with SBI Card core systems.  Responsible for creating a paperless environment for the channel, involves testing, giving inputs, UAT and GTM strategy. Heading the Process Excellence Unit for Telesales channel, 60+ sales units across the country. * Strategize Automation and Digitization:                  -Automation of Telesales force for the entire channel, Ensured seamless change management and transition management from a Manual environment to an automated set up. With a phase-wise, beta/production approach- Implemented Cloud based App dialers across 50 locations in 2 months, empowering 3000 users to  get digitized. Created a sales journey rather than just an automation of the workforce. Hit an adoption of 70% from the 2nd month of deployment.- Designed the one place centralized dashboard to view pan India reports at one click, with drill  down to the User Level. Available to all users starting the NSM till the Team Leader.- Currently working on a seamless fulfillment module for the sales unit.
experience.description_html:
Currently heading the Digital Sales portfolio and Leading the initiative to set up a telecalling unit for the Organically routed Customers. Introduced WFH Tele for SBI Card. With complete digital solutioning
Plan and Execute GTM strategy for effective increase in sales penetration using digital technology
Responsible for technology transition across locations, spanning over 4000 users.
Introduced fool proof security systems to make processes compliant across locations.
Created and deployed a rigorous Reporting and MIS process across these locations. Introducing & Developing digital one view dashboards for all locations.
Responsible for system integration with SBI Card core systems.
Responsible for creating a paperless environment for the channel, involves testing, giving inputs, UAT and GTM strategy.
Heading the Process Excellence Unit for Telesales channel, 60+ sales units across the country.

* Strategize Automation and Digitization:
-Automation of Telesales force for the entire channel, Ensured seamless change management and transition management from a Manual environment to an automated set up. With a phase-wise, beta/production approach
- Implemented Cloud based App dialers across 50 locations in 2 months, empowering 3000 users to get digitized. Created a sales journey rather than just an automation of the workforce. Hit an adoption of 70% from the 2nd month of deployment.
- Designed the one place centralized dashboard to view pan India reports at one click, with drill
down to the User Level. Available to all users starting the NSM till the Team Leader.
- Currently working on a seamless fulfillment module for the sales unit.

experience.title: Senior Manager - Digitization
experience.description: Digital Solutions:- Leading  Digital Strategy within the Center of Excellence for Operations.- Responsible for managing the Strategic Alliances with Agency and Bancassurance on the end to end     Fulfillment process.- Create, Coordinate and Execute GTM Plan for Digital Assets.- Driving innovation for the Bancassurance Channel around Lead Optimization, Customer Engagement,     Re-imagined Fulfillment & Sales Force Management.- Delivered CSG Agency– Customer Solution Generator for the Agency Sales force, digitally enabling the    team.- Delivered PROPAL Agency- Sales Manager tool to optimize performance thus increasing productivity. - Seller Insighting for all the Digital Assets of Max Life Insurance.- Project Managed the Tech. Support Helpdesk with strategic inputs on Servicing.
experience.description_html:
Digital Solutions:
- Leading Digital Strategy within the Center of Excellence for Operations.
- Responsible for managing the Strategic Alliances with Agency and Bancassurance on the end to end
Fulfillment process.
- Create, Coordinate and Execute GTM Plan for Digital Assets.
- Driving innovation for the Bancassurance Channel around Lead Optimization, Customer Engagement,
Re-imagined Fulfillment & Sales Force Management.
- Delivered CSG Agency– Customer Solution Generator for the Agency Sales force, digitally enabling the
team.
- Delivered PROPAL Agency- Sales Manager tool to optimize performance thus increasing productivity.
- Seller Insighting for all the Digital Assets of Max Life Insurance.
- Project Managed the Tech. Support Helpdesk with strategic inputs on Servicing.

experience.title: Manager Operations
experience.description: *Operations Management/Service StrategyResponsible for Business & Program Management focused around Customer Servicing by GENPACT.Ensure adherence to SOPs, Quality & Compliance, CTA, SLA’s, Provisioning & Budgeting and overall performance of the unit.Heading Reward program for the overall Genpact Max Life partnership.Successfully completed and was Certified the Six Sigma Green Belt Project Leader award for effectively improving TAT breach levels from 8% to 2%.Successfully increased the TAT of resolution of Payment Refund process from 60% to 90% by enhancing systems using the Six Sigma Green Belt tool
experience.description_html:
*Operations Management/Service Strategy
Responsible for Business & Program Management focused around Customer Servicing by GENPACT.
Ensure adherence to SOPs, Quality & Compliance, CTA, SLA’s, Provisioning & Budgeting and overall performance of the unit.
Heading Reward program for the overall Genpact Max Life partnership.
Successfully completed and was Certified the Six Sigma Green Belt Project Leader award for effectively improving TAT breach levels from 8% to 2%.
Successfully increased the TAT of resolution of Payment Refund process from 60% to 90% by enhancing systems using the Six Sigma Green Belt tool

experience.title: Lead - Strategy and Planning
experience.description: A leadership team member – Responsible for overall Strategy & Planning with extreme focus on Strategy, Talent and Efficiency, New Tie-ups by exploring opportunities with domestic and International clients. New Business – Procurement of US and Australian based Gas & Electricity Co. and Educational organizations.P&L Management & Revenue Generation– Responsible for the P&L Management of the company. Generated a total revenue of Rs.10 Million in just a period of 7 months.Stakeholder Management  - Instrumental in building partnerships with internal & external players – Key Account Management, Distribution network Alliances & Strategic Partnership with leading banks.People Management – Responsible for managing a workforce of ~100 peopleVendor Management – Spearheading the organization wide initiative on productivity enhancement, Cost Reduction and Negotiations.
experience.description_html:
A leadership team member – Responsible for overall Strategy & Planning with extreme focus on Strategy, Talent and Efficiency, New Tie-ups by exploring opportunities with domestic and International clients.
New Business – Procurement of US and Australian based Gas & Electricity Co. and Educational organizations.
P&L Management & Revenue Generation– Responsible for the P&L Management of the company. Generated a total revenue of Rs.10 Million in just a period of 7 months.
Stakeholder Management - Instrumental in building partnerships with internal & external players – Key Account Management, Distribution network Alliances & Strategic Partnership with leading banks.
People Management – Responsible for managing a workforce of ~100 people
Vendor Management – Spearheading the organization wide initiative on productivity enhancement, Cost Reduction and Negotiations.

experience.title: Deputy Manager Operations
experience.description: Joined an Asst. Manager to manage the Operations and Services of Maxlife in a Corporate Agency set-up (GTMS).Streamlining business processes and enhancing performances around servicing metrics.Was awarded as the best center pan India for 6 months in a row. Planning and Setting up of a domestic helpline center for the rural customers at optimized cost levels.Digitize the Claims database for faster processing and better tracking of the claim process.Internal Auditor- Was Certified as an Internal Auditor of Max Life – ISO 9001:2000.

Joined an Asst. Manager to manage the Operations and Services of Maxlife in a Corporate Agency set-up (GTMS).
Streamlining business processes and enhancing performances around servicing metrics.
Was awarded as the best center pan India for 6 months in a row.
Planning and Setting up of a domestic helpline center for the rural customers at optimized cost levels.
Digitize the Claims database for faster processing and better tracking of the claim process.
Internal Auditor- Was Certified as an Internal Auditor of Max Life – ISO 9001:2000.

recommendations: Yashwant Goel “I have known Sylvester for over a decade, and have always found find him to be an extremely sincere, dedicated and efficient team player. He has all the qualities that I could have wished in a team member - Customer Focus, Passion, Execution mindset. He worked with me in the Distribution Digitisation at Max life, and successfully executed several digital projects. I would love to have him in my team in the future and recommend him as a highly capable and mature professional.”

Puja Abhishek Singh “One of the most humble, committed and dedicated professional I have worked with. He has excellent Skill set in Project Management, Digitization and Process Excellence. Is an asset to the team and I would strongly recommend him for these skills. He is a person I would always like to have in my team. ”
